law.text:
In criminal cases, the following fees shall be charged by the circuit clerk and paid to the clerk at the time the corresponding services are requested:
Preparing an attestation ...................................................................................... $0.50
Preparing a certification ..................................................................................... $5.00
Preparing a copy of a document (per page) ....................................................... $0.25.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 5, effective August 1, 2002.
